MWElement.name: PR650 Driver
MWElement.description: PR650 Driver. Synchronization Frequency is the frequency of device you're measuring (0 for a DC measurement). Integration time is in ms (use 0 for auto). Average Count is the number of samples to average before returning a value. Unit type is 0 for footLamberts (footcandles) or 1 for CD/m^2 (lux).
